external_references.source_name: Trend Micro Ransomware Spotlight Play July 2023
external_references.description: Trend Micro Research. (2023, July 21). Ransomware Spotlight: Play. Retrieved September 24, 2024.

objects.description: [Play](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1040) has used tools such as [AdFind](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0552), [Nltest](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0359), and [BloodHound](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0521) to enumerate shares and hostnames on compromised networks.(Citation: Trend Micro Ransomware Spotlight Play July 2023)
